scripts.abigen: solc openzeppelin-solidity=$(pwd)/node_modules/openzeppelin-solidity --allow-paths node_modules/openzeppelin-solidity/contracts --combined-json=bin,abi,userdoc,devdoc,metadata contracts/SimpleSwap.sol | tee output.json && abigen -pkg contract -out simpleswap.go --combined-json output.json && rm output.json
